Pošlji testno elektronsko sporočilo na svoj naslov.

We recommend that you access the “Prefer: Priporočamo, da za ponovni priklic svojega "Ključa za obnovo računa" dostopate preko rubrike »Uporabniške nastavitve« in ključ varno shranite. Ta ključ bo nujen za obnovitev vašega dostopa do platforme in vaših podatkov, če pozabite geslo.
The number of activities recently detect:
The number of activities recently detected appears to be higher than usual.

This could be a sign of an attack (for example, someone flooding your server with bogus information) or just a usage spike due to an increased visibility of your project.

Examine the issue to determine whether it is legitimate or not.

{ActivityDump}

{FreeMemory} of {TotalMemory} available diskspace used.

Dear {RecipientName},\\n\\nThis is a tes:
Dear {RecipientName},

This is a test email sent out from the platform's administrative interface.

Reception of this email indicates that the server was able to authenticate to and interact with the SMTP mail server.

Dear {RecipientName},\\n\\nThis is an em:
Dear {RecipientName},

This is an email to notify you that a request has been made to change your email address to {NewEmailAddress}.

Click the following link to validate this change:
{Url}

If you didn't request this change, change your password and contact your system administrator.

Kind regards,
{NodeName}

Dear {RecipientName},\\n\\nThis is an em:
Dear {RecipientName},

This is an email to inform you that your PGP key is expiring or has already expired.

You should extend its validity and update the key present on the platform, or upload a new key.

{PGPKeyInfo}

Without a valid PGP key, the system won't be able to encrypt data provided to you.

Kind regards,
{NodeName}
Na voljo je posodobitev programske opreme.
Dear {RecipientName},\\n\\n{ExpiringSubm:
Dear {RecipientName},

{ExpiringSubmissionCount} reports are expiring and will be soon deleted.

The earliest expiration date is {EarliestExpirationDate}.

Please remember to check them before they are deleted.

{Url}

Kind regards,
{NodeName}
Some reports will expire soon: Nekaterim prijavam se bo kmalu iztekla veljavnost
Dear {RecipientName},\\n\\nThis is an em:
Dear {RecipientName},

This is an email to notify you that a whistleblower has selected you as a valuable recipient of their report.

You are asked to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks in the interest of the public. Therefore the material provided within this report should be considered to be of high importance.

The report can be accessed at:
{Url}

Kind regards,
{NodeName}
Reminder about unread or updated reports: Opomnik o neprebranih ali dopolnjenih prijavah.

The chosen password is too weak. A valid: Izbrano geslo je prešibko. Veljavno geslo mora imeti najmanj 12 znakov in vsebovati različne znake, vključno z vsaj malo tiskano črko, veliko tiskano črko, številko in posebnim znakom.

Please summarize your report in a few wo: V nekaj besedah opišite svojo prijavo.

When did the facts happen?: Kdaj so se navedena dejstva zgodila?
I witnessed the facts in person: Osebno sem bil priča navedenim dejstvom
It is a rumor I heard: Gre za govorico, ki sem jo slišal

A thorough description of the submitted: Podroben opis predloženih dokazov poveča našo sposobnost ocenjevanja trditev in preiskave. Bodite pozorni, da se sklicujete na znatne dele vseh predloženih videoposnetkov, slik ali dokumentov.
Have you reported the facts to other org: Ali ste z omenjenimi dejstvi seznanili tudi druge organizacije in/ali posameznike?
Please list the organizations and/or ind: Navedite organizacije in/ali posameznike, ki ste jih seznanili z navedenimi dejstvi.
Have these organizations investigated yo: Ali so te organizacije preiskovale vaše navedbe? Če da, kakšen je bil izid?
What is the outcome you want to achieve: Kaj želite doseči z našo podporo?
Do you want to provide your identificati: Do you want to provide your identification information?
I prefer to be contacted via this platfo: Želim, da me kontaktirate samo preko te platforme

This could be a sign of an attack (for e: To je lahko znak napada (na primer nekdo, ki vaš strežnik preplavi z lažnimi informacijami) ali zgolj porast uporabe zaradi večje vidnosti vašega projekta.
Examine the issue to determine whether i: Preučite zadevo, da ugotovite, ali je utemeljena ali ne.
The server cannot guarantee that a new r: Strežnik ne more zagotoviti shranjevanja novih prijav, zato je oddajanje onemogočeno.
Please consider asking your technical su: Zaprosite tehnično podporo, naj zagotovi več prostora na disku strežnika.
GlobaLeaks technology includes a server: V tehnologijo GlobaLeaks je vključena komponenta za preverjanje stanja strežnika, ki vas bo opozorila, če bo kaj zahtevalo vašo pozornost.
For more information, log in to the Admi: Za več informacij se vpišite v vmesnik za administratorje in si oglejte rubriki "Sistemska statistika" in "Anomalije".
